column1: Visitation will be held on Monday
column4: from 1 to 3:30 p.m. at the Crawford Funeral Home in Escanaba. Escanaba Eagle Aries 1088 Auxiliary will hold their memorial services at 2:30 p.m. The funeral services will follow at 4 p.m. at Bethany Lutheran Church officiated by Pastor Eric Heskin. A luncheon will follow in the church hall.
